statements: SELECT * FROM loss_history_data;
SELECT customer_name, claim_amount FROM loss_history_data;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, customer_name FROM loss_history_data ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loss_history_data WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, settlement_date FROM loss_history_data ORDER BY settlement_date;
SELECT * FROM loss_history_data WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT incident_id, customer_name, claim_amount FROM loss_history_data WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_date, customer_name, claim_amount FROM loss_history_data WHERE settlement_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY claim_amount ASC, incident_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, settlement_date FROM loss_history_data WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND claim_amount > 10000 ORDER BY settlement_date DESC;

SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS average_claim_amount, COUNT(incident_id) AS total_incidents FROM loss_history_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_incidents > 3 ORDER BY average_claim_amount DESC, total_incidents DESC;
SELECT * FROM LossHistory;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, claim_amount FROM LossHistory WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM UnderwritingRisk ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_id, risk_rating, risk_description FROM UnderwritingRisk WHERE risk_rating >= 3;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, settlement_amount FROM LossHistory WHERE settlement_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM LossHistory ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, claim_amount FROM LossHistory WHERE claim_amount > 10000;
SELECT incident_description, settlement_amount FROM LossHistory WHERE settlement_amount IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM UnderwritingRisk WHERE risk_rating BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT risk_description FROM UnderwritingRisk WHERE policy_holder_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM LossHistoryData;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, claim_amount FROM LossHistoryData ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_description, settlement_amount FROM LossHistoryData WHERE settlement_amount > 10000;
SELECT incident_type, location, damage_description FROM IncidentDetails WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT claimant_name, contact_info FROM Claimants ORDER BY claimant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM LossHistoryData;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, claim_amount FROM LossHistoryData WHERE settlement_amount > 1000;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location FROM IncidentDetails WHERE incident_type = 'Fire';
SELECT claimant_name, contact_info FROM Claimants WHERE claimant_id = 3;
SELECT incident_id AS id, incident_description AS description FROM LossHistoryData ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LossHistoryData;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, claim_amount FROM LossHistoryData WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM IncidentDetails ORDER BY policy_holder_name DESC;
SELECT policy_number, policy_holder_name, policy_type FROM IncidentDetails WHERE policy_type = 'Home';
SELECT incident_id, claim_date, settlement_date FROM ClaimDetails WHERE settlement_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM IncidentDetails ORDER BY policy_holder_name ASC;
SELECT incident_id, policy_holder_name, claim_amount FROM IncidentDetails WHERE policy_type = 'Auto';
SELECT incident_date, incident_description FROM LossHistoryData WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM ClaimDetails JOIN SettlementDetails ON ClaimDetails.claim_id = SettlementDetails.claim_id WHERE settlement_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount, MIN(claim_amount) AS min_claim_amount FROM LossHistoryData;
SELECT * FROM LossHistoryData LIMIT 3;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM LossHistoryData WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT incident_id, claim_amount, settlement_amount FROM LossHistoryData ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_phone FROM ClaimantDetails WHERE claimant_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT location, cause, risk_level FROM IncidentDetails WHERE risk_level >= 3;
SELECT * FROM LossHistoryData WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description, settlement_amount FROM LossHistoryData WHERE settlement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_email FROM IncidentDetails JOIN ClaimantDetails ON IncidentDetails.incident_id = ClaimantDetails.claimant_id WHERE IncidentDetails.location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM UnderwritingData ORDER BY risk_score DESC, premium_amount ASC;
SELECT incident_id, assessment_date, assessment_notes FROM RiskAssessment WHERE incident_id = 1001;
